data.eml:eml: Species of Bicellaria (Diptera: Hybotidae) from Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barták, Miroslav, Plant, Adrian, Kubík, Štěpán (2013): Species of Bicellaria (Diptera: Hybotidae) from Asia. Zootaxa 3710 (3): 233-256, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3710.3.3
